candidate.name: Cindy Sawyers
candidate.headline: Operations Manager
candidate.summary: A focussed, results-driven team player with many year experience in the field. Working my way up to management level, I have experience of every aspect of this role. I understand the challenges it brings, and have a proven track record of providing solutions.

experience_entries.title: Executive Assistant
experience_entries.summary:
• Dealt with contacts and correspondence.
  • Managed suppliers, contractors and office systems.
  • Maintained handbooks, policies and practices, ensuring they were understood and adhered to by all staff.
  • Coordinated and project managed the office relocation and renovation.

experience_entries.title: Resources Manager
experience_entries.summary:
• Coordinated agendas and papers, minute taking and maintaining records for the management committee.
  • Managed vendor/supplier relationships.
  • Responsible for overall management of the office, including budgets and building and facilities management.
  • Ensured compliance with health and safety and other workplace legislation, including regular risk assessments.

experience_entries.title: Administrative Officer
experience_entries.summary:
• Managed the implementation and development of an effective recruitment program.
  • Organised Fire and First Aid training.
  • Developed induction and handover processes for staff, interns, trustees and volunteers.
  • Planned and managed the CEO\\â€™s diary of internal and external meetings.
